products.title: Silver Birch, Larkspur - Roman Blind
products.description: Silver birch larkspur takes your eye on a journey of colour and form to create a stunning visual that will enrich the dcor in any home. The gentle blues and greens flow across the fabric, tracing out the true beauty of the countryside as they go. A feature wall in the same colour as the light blue will make the perfect partner to transform the living room. Add a couple of country-inspired watercolour prints to it and you'll be able to create the homely ambience that you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Stags, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The stags charcoal would make a stunning addition to any country home, whether traditional or contemporary. A grey and oatmeal base features gorgeous prints of regal stags in a deep charcoal grey, offering a neutral canvas that could match a range of colour schemes. Give this rural accessory a home in the guest or master bedroom, settling it amongst country checks and other rustic animal prints, such as rabbits or pheasants.

products.title: Maps, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Made for the adventurer in us all, the maps in grey offers a subtle nod to the travels we'd all like to take - or perhaps already have. By hanging this in your window, you won't need a map on the wall, and you can see the whole world from inside your home. The grey would make a fantastic addition to a study or den, and you could choose to go monochrome with white or pale grey walls and black and white furnishings and accessories.

products.title: Smash, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: In grafter's grey, this fun edition from the smash range incorporates the typical geometric patterning in a casual, hand-painted style, this time in ice white. The cloth used is a tightly woven linen, which boasts a high quality and long-lasting durability. Use the jet to form a studious space to work in, whether this is your home office, work studio, or a teenager's bedroom. Keep the walls white in order to maintain a light and airy feel, and insert a pop of colour in berry red, funky violet, or petrol blue to add personality and charm.

products.title: Helix, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The helix in grey displays contemporary patterning of neatly drawn florals coloured in varying shades of grey, ranging from stone to charcoal. The cool white background allows the imagery to pop from the canvas, making the blind simultaneously striking yet understated. Use the grey to temper a brightly coloured feature wall painted in a rich red or burnt orange shade, perhaps in the dining room or den.

products.title: Birdsong, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look that will never grow old. Match birdsong shadow with some simple country touches like a light beige rug on a wooden floor and a hessian canvas on the wall to create the homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Duck, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: The country feel of the duck in stone is tempered by the contemporary monochrome of the duck illustrations. The stone background adds to the effect, whilst the delicate detailing of the duck imagery brings back the traditional element of the design. Use the stone in the utility or downstairs cloakroom to add character to an often under-dcorated space. Keep the remainder of the room to blacks, whites, and greys, resulting in a monochrome and unusual look filled with plenty of character.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Silver Grey Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their silver grey colour - a light warm grey tone that is a perfect sophisticated and sleek complement to any room.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Pewter Sheen Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their pewter sheen grey colour - a dark warm grey tone that is a perfect sophisticated and sleek complement to any room.

products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Graphite Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their graphite grey colour - a deep cool grey tone that is a perfect sophisticated and sleek complement to any room.

products.title: Faux Suede, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in charcoal offers a different take on jet black, providing a softer monochrome shade that is much less overpowering, whilst the touchable suede-feel fabric is warm and cosy, and barely distinguishable from the real thing. The subtle quality of the charcoal makes this roman blind the perfect hue for taming a brighter and bolder colour scheme. Use to break up a strong red and black dining room; a lime and neon teenager's bedroom; or a cobalt blue bathroom.

products.title: Devonshire, Light Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Ideal for creating a contemporary look in any room, the devonshire in light grey is formed from an array of white and stormy grey threads for a distinctive looking blind with a subtle texture and a modern, washed denim finish. Form a soothing and rejuvenating base of white and dove grey for a modern palette in your home office, framing the light grey with pale yet heavy linens. Incorporate darker tweeds and other rustic fabrics for a current and contrasting theme with a comforting, country twist.

products.title: Devonshire, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce an simple and elegant look with the devonshire in stone, where a blend of fine, creamy threads merge to form a sophisticated blind with a graceful and relaxed fall, and in a contemporary, pale grey hue. For a modern decor scheme with a cool and fresh vibe, blend the stone with mushroom, dove grey, and charcoal shades, layering with alike textured fabrics and contrasting linens to form a classy finish with current style and comfort.

products.title: Devonshire, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Create a welcoming and contemporary look with the devonshire in charcoal grey, which showcases a distinctive style with its delicate texture and modern, washed denim effect in a neat weave of dove grey and slate threads. Highlight the stylish charcoal by placing it against contrasting white walls and subdued grey linens, forming a modern and charismatic look. Complement the deep grey shade by matching with soft furnishings and features in similar stormy hues, and accent with a bolder colour of your choice, such as fuschia or lime.

products.title: Cellular Taupe Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Graphite Perfect Fit
products.description: Clipping snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required clipping snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Anthracite Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: The deep anthracite grey slat is a 'statement neutral', drawing the eye as a key furnishing, while still pairing smartly with all colour schemes. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the most simple shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles. Matching the ral 7016 code, you can be sure this will match your new bifold doors perfectly.

products.title: Slate Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: The heavy hue of slate grey is a superb choice for classically styled rooms featuring lots of wood and leather. Clipping direct to the window, perfect fits are a swift and simple shading solution to conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Round out a muted palette with this mid-gloss grey satin perfect fit. Its clay tones pair well with pastel decor, with a gentle sheen that catches the light without creating sunglare. Their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for high-traffic or humid spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Silver Sparkle Perfect Fit
products.description: Classic grey gets a shimmering upgrade with their silver sparkle perfect fit. Perfect for adding a bit of glitz to your kitchen, conservatory or patio door, its glitterbomb flecks dance in the light for a captivating take on conventional monochrome styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.description: Hivelussostone perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. products.title: Indira, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The indira charcoal is a unique and eye-catching roman blind featuring an array of beautifully drawn elephants surrounded by intricate patterning. The charcoal background is the perfect canvas for the creamy grey oatmeal of the imagery, and offsets it wonderfully. Team the charcoal with other charcoal greys, the occasional navy blue, and plenty of matching cream for cosy yet moody look in a den or sitting room, where warmth and comfort always come first.

products.title: Silver Birch, Willow - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract trees and blossoms of the silver birch range are this time coloured in mustard yellow, turquoise aqua, and soft coral tones, tempered by greys and whites in the willow offering. The hushed yet pretty hues of the willow would be well-suited to adding just a hint of colour to an otherwise white or neutral room, where the aim is to keep the space feeling light, airy, and breathable. This could work beautifully in a utility room or downstairs cloakroom where space is limited and light is needed.

products.title: Foliage, Slate Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: Beautifully understated, the foliage in slate blue places autumn images of leaves in summer colours of pale teal and soft biscuit on a creamy white background. The end result is one of light and airiness, making it a subtle addition to complement any contemporary dcor. Place the slate blue in a relaxed living room or bedroom for a serene and peaceful ambience. Surround it with similar tones of cream, teal, and biscuit, with the occasional golden tone for added depth and personality.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral.

products.title: Bird Garden, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Certain to provide any space with modern vintage chic, the bird garden in charcoal displays an array of lovely birds and blooming florals in a snow white shade on a bed of distressed grey. This blind is pretty and sweet, absolute in forming a delightfully balmy and airy casual ambience in any surrounding. Combine the delicate grey shades with a vibrant mustard yellow for modern impact, or with a rich aubergine for ultimate contrast.

products.title: Baa Baa, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: A sweet and subtle blind, the baa baa in charcoal offers a grainy, dove grey canvas adorned with sheep illustrations in checked, argyle, and striped patterns coloured in charcoal, slate, and stone greys. The roman folds provide neatness and structure, giving a lovely, curved aesthetic. Keep the nursery low-key, yet still full of personality, with the characterful charcoal. Join it with gentle whites and similar greys, opting for contemporary, chalk-painted furniture and soft woollen fabrics.
